rooms.description: A spacious foyer with floor-to-ceiling windows on one side, inviting natural light and ensuring a welcoming environment in accordance with Vastu principles.

Large open space with bohemian decor elements and high ceilings, featuring extensive floor-to-ceiling window panels for brightness and connectivity with the exterior. Designed to serve as a communal gathering area.
Open kitchen integrated with dining area, offering natural lighting from floor-to-ceiling windows on one side; equipped with modern amenities while retaining bohemian style.

Private master suite featuring a walk-in closet and an en-suite bathroom. The room is designed with large windows for ample natural light, positioned in accordance with Vastu guidelines to maximize energy flow.
Cozy guest bedroom with access to a small balcony or window view; designed to ensure comfort and privacy.
A shared balcony adjacent to the living area, providing an outdoor seating space enriched with bohemian decor elements such as hanging plants and artisanal decor.

openings.description: Stylish entrance door aligning with the villaâ€™s aesthetic, placed in a Vastu-compliant position.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in living area ensuring ample natural light and ventilation.
Multiple floor-to-ceiling windows that provide a bright, airy feel to the space.
Seamless transition from interior living spaces to the outdoor balcony.

rooms.description: Well-lit bedroom with large windows; features bohemian decor and privacy for family members.
Cozy bedroom with natural light, incorporating bohemian design elements and comfortable space for family members.
Dedicated workspace featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance focus and creativity, in line with modern working styles and Vastu guidelines.
Additional guest bedroom designed with comfort and functionality in mind, ensuring privacy and ample natural light through large windows.

openings.description: Well-designed staircase connecting ground floor to first floor, ensuring smooth flow and compliance with safety norms.
Large windows providing natural light and ventilation for each bedroom, placed according to Vastu guidelines.
